channel.title: Media on Josh M. Ryan
channel.description: Recent content in Media on Josh M. Ryan

item.title: Media
item.description:
• Interviewed by Politifact.com on the Hyde Amendment on June 11, 2019.

  • Interviewed by the Deseret News on Abortion Protests at the Utah State Capitol on May 21, 2019.

  • Interviewed by Politifact.com on the government shutdown on January 17, 2019.

  • Interviewed by Politifact.com on voting records and government shutdowns on August 6, 2018.

  • Coverage of committee partisanhip research on Legbranch.org and Bloomberg News, May 2018.

  • Interviewed by Politifact.com on Florida Senator Bill Nelson’s legislative productivity on April 11 and April 19, 2018.

  • Interviewed by Politifact.com on the government shutdown on January 22, 2018 and previous shutdowns January 22, 2018.

  • Interviewed by Politifact.com on the health care repeal bill, Senate procedures, and conference committees on July 26, 2017 and July 30, 2017.

  • Interviewed by the Daily Briefing, The Advisory Board Company’s health care newsletter on the health care repeal bill and the reconciliation process, July 31, 2017.

  • Coverage of redistricting research in Chicago Tribune, June 5, 2015.

  • Coverage of gubernatorial veto powers research in Chicago Tribune, May 2, 2014.

  • Media coverage of Reconsidering the `Palin Effect’ in 2008 in Peoria-Journal Star, the Washington Examiner and other outlets, November and December 2013.

  • Interviewed by WMBD 1470 Talk Station, February 24, 2012, August 24, 2012, and November 21, 2014.

  • Live in-studio commentary and analysis: elections and registration process, October 28, 2013; the third presidential debate, October 22, 2012; Illinois primary election night, March 20, 2012. WMBD-31, Peoria/Bloomington.

  • Interviewed by WHOI-19, Peoria/Bloomington, numerous occasions.

  • Interviewed by WMBD-31 Peoria/Bloomington, numerous occasions.

  • Interviewed by Peoria-Journal Star, numerous occasions.

  • Interviewed by Chicago Sun-Times on Aaron Schock corruption charges, March 9, 2015.
